nodes.text: Grizzid was male humanoid and a notorious free-trader and smuggler. He was hired by the Bothan merchant Grendu to transport a rancor from the Tarsunt system. However, the rancor killed Grizzid and his crew and his ship crashed on Tatooine. The ship was discovered by the Jawa Tteel Kkak, who sold the location of the wreck to Bidlo Kwerve, a servant of Jabba Desilijic Tiure.
